questions.question: Lower Yellowstone Falls are how high? Hint: Twice as high as Niagra Falls.
Upper Yellowstone falls is larger than Lower Yellowstone falls
The Lower Yellowstone falls plunges 308ft into the Grand Canyon of Yellowstone which is estimated to be how many feet deep?
questions.info: The mandatory killing of rainbow and brook trout caught in the Lamar River drainage is intended to protect native cutthroat trout.

questions.question: In what year did mountain man Jim Bridger first see the Lower Yellowstone Falls?
questions.info: The road along the Lamar Valley is the only road open year-long.
